title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern and responsive portfolio website built with React. Features include dark/light theme, smooth animations, and a contact form.

title: Task Master Pro
description: The project is a Todo App, which likely allows users to manage tasks by adding, filtering, and marking them as complete or incomplete. It is structured as a modern web application with reusable components and a focus on modularity.

title: Anime Watchlist
description: Anime Watchlist is a responsive web and Android application that helps users track, rate, and organize anime. Users can add series to their collection, assign ratings on a 0-10 scale, organize anime into tier rankings, and track their watch status. The app features both light and dark themes, and stores data locally with an optimized Android version that significantly reduces app size.

title: Simple Calculator
description: A clean and functional calculator web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
